titleStmt.title: A bvll from Rome, consisting of 15 pardons for delinquents in these kingdomes vvith a declaration of the Popes election in the chaire at Rome where the cardinalls, with their stript-up armes, doe use to feele, before his consecration, whether he bee a man or woman : whereunto is occasionally related by them the orginall cause of womens vailes and of their wicked tongues.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
